abstract: Nina Sorokina, principal dancer with Bolshoi Ballet from 1960s to 1980s whose impeccable technique, charm and buoyancy made her an ideal partner for her husband, the fiery, athletic Yuri Vladimirov, dies at age 69.
snippet: Ms. Sorokina was a principal dancer with the Bolshoi Ballet, along with her husband and partner, Yuri Vladimirov.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Sorokina was a principal dancer with the Bolshoi Ballet, along with her husband and partner, Yuri Vladimirov.

headline.main: Nina Sorokina, Dancer With the Bolshoi Ballet, Dies at 69
headline.print_headline: Nina Sorokina, 69, Dancer With the Bolshoi Ballet
headline.seo: Nina Sorokina, Dancer With the Bolshoi Ballet, Dies at 69
